meanings.definition: A shoe consisting of a sole fastened by straps.
meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable sandal to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The children ran around in their sandals during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The sandal decided to take a walk on its own.
meanings.sent4: The sandal of time marches forward, never looking back.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sandal stood out among the crowd.

meanings.definition: A flat-soled shoe with straps that go between the toes and around the ankle.
meanings.sent1: He bought a new pair of sandals for his vacation.
meanings.sent2: She felt the warm sand beneath her sandals at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The sandal told a joke and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her sandals were like loyal friends, always by her side.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling sandal shimmered in the sunlight.
